attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People reporting at the immigration centers who can not be send home now should be allowed some temporary right to work for some number of years without any access to benefits until some number of years.
l think it will also help the government in time like this economics problems since they can never have access to benefits only working and paying their taxes than paying a lot of monies trying to send some people home.
